pages.text: To the average Minecrafter, the $(item)Poisonous Potato$() might seem like a wasted opportunity. By crafting and wearing $(item)Luck of the Irish$() though, a great benefit can be extracted from them. The $(item)Gleaming Compound$() contained in it can transmute the poison effect one usually gets afflicted with into $(thing)Regeneration II$() by applying knowledge gained from the incorporated $(item)Enchanted Golden Apple$().
